data.actual_result: It opens the channel but scrolls you to the position of the New messages bar instead
data.expected_result: It opens the other channel and scrolls you to where the linked message is
data.short_description: Tapping on a message link won't take you to the scroll position of the message if the channel has some unreads
data.steps_to_repro: - Copy the link to a message in an active channel - Post the link in a different channel - Wait for 10-20 new messages to be posted in the channel you were originally. Don't switch to channel - Tap the link
